original_text: These are the sons of Gilead: of Jeezer, the family of the Jeezerites: of Helek, the family of the Helekites:
korean_text: 길르앗 자손은 이러하니 이에셀에게서 난 이에셀 종족과 헬렉에게서 난 헬렉 종족과

sentences.original_text: These are the sons of Gilead:
of Jeezer, the family of the Jeezerites:
of Helek, the family of the Helekites:
